name: Ayesha Rahman
review: Absolutely loved the facial! The staff was very professional and friendly.

name: Nadia Hossain
review: The bridal makeup was flawless. Got so many compliments at my wedding!

name: Farhana Alam
review: Hair spa was relaxing but I expected a bit more from the ambiance.

name: Tania Akter
review: Nail art was so cute and lasted longer than I thought!

name: Rehana Sultana
review: Service was quick and hygienic. Definitely coming back for waxing.

name: Moumita Das
review: Threading was a little painful but results were great.

name: Sumaiya Chowdhury
review: Nice and clean environment. Staff was very polite and skilled.

name: Shabnam Jahan
review: Good value for money. Party makeup stayed intact the whole night.

name: Lubna Karim
review: Manicure and pedicure were okay, but nothing extraordinary.
